entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 08:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -27.3°C
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -30.3°C
Wind: SSE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:05 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:05 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:05 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
